intro: Exacum hamiltonii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Primulaceae and is characterized by its compact growth habit and showy, clustered flowers. Exacum hamiltonii is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
